articles.title: "Fast Money": Bitcoin, Ether Touch Record Highs On Crypto Adoption, Inflation Fears - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Bitcoin rose as high as $67,803 and ether, the second-biggest cryptocurrency by market value, hit $4,825 in early Asian hours.
articles.content:
